DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate possible affection optic nerve retinal function follow intravitreal bevacizumab injection human eye .
DOC.brief_title: Optic Nerve Retinal Functions With Bevacizumab
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate retinal optic nerve function bevacizumab injected intravitreal human eye use electrophysiological test ; Electroretinogram ( ERG ) Visual Evoked Potentials ( VEP ) . Forty five eye 45 patient choroidal neovascular membrane ( CNV ) prepare intravitreal injection 1.25mg bevacizumab underwent baseline ERG VEP eye , 1 4 week intravitreal injection .
DOC.keyword: Optic nerve retinal function follow intravitreal bevacizumab
